title: Cities of Refuge Appointed
summary: Joshua 20 establishes six cities of refuge, where people who commit unintentional manslaughter can flee for protection. These cities ensure justice and prevent revenge killings until a fair trial is held.

faq.question: What was the purpose of the cities of refuge?
faq.answer: To protect those who killed someone unintentionally and ensure a fair trial.

faq.question: How many cities of refuge were established?
